titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction from gross income to individuals who do not itemize deductions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/14/2002--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a direct charitable tax deduction for an individual not itemizing deductions equal to the amount that would be allowed for charitable cash contributions if such individual itemized.
